title: Champion Concept Idea
body:
Jerrit - The Void Sage.

Ranged, Mage.
It took me a while but i think i like this idea best, it may need a few adjustments but i'm satisfied with the overall idea.
Numbers are a rough estimate for an Average. (Based loosely off of Syndras, Viktors and Vel'Kozs' base stats (2017). 

HP - 500-550
Mana - 300-400
AD - 50-65
AP - 0
Armor - 25-30
MR - 25-35
Attack Speed - O.620-0.650
Movement Speed - 320-340
HP Regen - 6-8
Mana Regen 6-8
Attack Range - 530-560 units


Passive - EXPOSURE: When Jerrit opens a rift portal he becomes exposed to the magic of the void and for a short duration he gains a bonus to his Ability Power and Attack Damage, also a small increase to his mana regeneration, while also losing a small percentage of his HP during the duration.
(Scaling every 3 levels)
Exposure has a cooldown after each occurrence.
When below 20% HP will revert to lowest level changes.
Duration: 3/3/4/4/5/5 seconds
Bonus AP: 3.5%/4%/4.5%/5%/5.5%/6%
Bonus AD: 3.5%/4%/4.5%/5%/5.5%/6%
Mana Regeneration per second: 1.5%/2%/2.5%/3%/3.5%/4%
Loss of HP per second: 0.25%/0.5%/0.75%/1%/1.25%/1.5%
Cooldown: 10/12/14/16/18/20 seconds
Functionality - Buff, 


Q: Opens a small rift portal to the void beside him and another at target location, Jerrit then flicks a small magical orb through the portal opening besides him which then travels through the void, gaining size, velocity and magical power, and is then released from the rift portal at target location, firing the orb in a line, damaging and slowing all enemies in casting range.
Delayed cast of 0.25 seconds upon selecting the second target location, standing in place during cast.
Set Damage: 60/100/140/180/220
AP Scaling: 70%
Slow: 30%/35%/40%/45%/50%
Cooldown: 9/8/7/6/5 Seconds
Mana Cost: 50/55/60/65/70
Functionality - Primary Poke, Slow, Zone Control,


W: Jerrit manipulates an area of space at target location and transforms it into void terrain for a short duration, causing all enemies that cross though it to be slowed and have their armor and magic resistance reduced, while increasing movement speed to those affected by Exposure.
Duration: 6/7/8/9/10
Slow: 35% all levels
Movement Speed: 15/20/25/30/35
Armor/Magic Resistance Reduction: -10/-20/-30/-40/-50
Cooldown: 21/18/15/12/9 Seconds
Mana Cost: 60 all levels
Functionality - Slow,Buff, Debuff, Zone Control,


E: Jerrit throws a handful of dust into a portal to the void that appears within 300 units around him, the dust will reappear from the casting loaction after 5 seconds within the void, or you may recast the ability sooner after the 1st second, if left for the full duration in the void, the dust will reappear from the portal, scattered out back towards Jerrit the dust is sped up and bursts out damaging all enemies within range in a wide arc, if recast before the full duration the dust fires as a short cone from casting location instead and deals less damage, whenever E kills an enemy it heals Jerrit for a small portion of his HP (healing stacks for multiple enemies killed at one time by E up to 10%)

Delayed Cast of 1-5 second upon ability use, no movement restriction.
Set Damage: 90/120/170/230/300
Recast Damage: 70/100/140/190/250
AP Scaling: 90%
Heals: 2.5% all levels
Cooldown: 19/17/14/11/9 Seconds
Mana Cost: 90/85/80/75/70
HP Cost: 20/35/55/75/100
Functionality - Poke, Heal,


R: Jerrit channels for a few seconds before opening a rift portal at target location big enough for one champion, Jerrit or an ally can pass through it and enter the void disappearing for a short duration and becoming untargetable, before reemerging at another target location after a short delay, upon leaving the void an ally will receive the Exposure effect for a short amount of time, but without Exposure's cost, if Jerrit himself enters the rift portal he will automatically receive the Exposure effect at the end of R's use, however it will remain in effect either until Jerrit dies, reaches 20% of his HP or he toggles it off.
Channel Time: 2 seconds all levels
Duration in void: 0.5/1/1.5/2/2.5 Seconds
Duration of 'Exposure on Ally: 6/7/8/9/10 Seconds
Cooldown: 90 Seconds all levels
Mana Cost: 100 all levels
Functionality - Transportation, Buff





Summoner - Natan96 (OCE)

replies.body: Current kit seems really boring. There's nothing outstanding that makes it fun. Maybe think of more interesting adverse affects. Ziggs bombs bounce which is what makes them interesting, Orianna's ball is the source of the rest of her abilities, Syndra can interact with her spheres. Right he kinda just throws them at you for damage.

Well i think of it kind of like a Vel'Koz Q that's coming from a location of your choosing because it's not directly from him, but instead of splitting at the end of the cast range it phases through the enemy and slows them, before the orb travels back through the void and returns to Jerrit.

So it's more about control in area, like lock-down.

in all honesty jarrit seems like he is overly complicated and hard to use, it also seems like he would be riddled with bugs he seems like a weaker mix of azir and malzahar with less presence as it he dosent seem to have too much sieging power.

Hey thanks for your input, aha i can see why you might think that, though i imagine his Q to be more like a combination of Syndra, Azir and Viktor moves except the orb would appear at the location specified and then move in a line, from there to the end of it's cast range, so his Q would be meant as his primary poke tool to damage and slow enemies in the line, before using his E for his secondary poke as they are slowed, also his E would be cast a short distance from in front of him (if that makes sense) so basically if any enemies get too close it becomes useless, i said it takes 0.5 seconds to cast because dust isn't powered until that long after being thrown out, i imagine it to be like Yas' windwall in that regard, like it isn't cast from his immediate location but from just in front of him and then out in a wide arc.
I'm really just trying to help you see it in your mind like i do :)
